headline: 2 shot dead in Seattle homeless encampment
content: By Ed Payne, CNNUpdated 1026 GMT (1826 HKT) January 27, 2016  (CNN)Two people were killed and three others were wounded at a Seattle area homeless encampment, police said. The shooter is at large. Two killed, three wounded following shooting in greenbelt near Airport Way S and S Atlantic St: https://t.co/tBKp2bKdsXThe reasons for #homelessness are complex and ending homelessness will not be solved easily or quickly. There are no simple solutions.
